case_title: United States of America v. McClees et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. McClees et al

charges.charge_description: Title 18 U.S.C.§661, 2, and 1152 - LARCENY W/IN SPECIAL MARITIME JURISDICTION(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to two (2) months in Bureau of Prisons; one (1) year supervised release with conditions; no fine imposed; $25 special assessment due instanter

charges.charge_description: Title 18, U.S.C.§661; Title 18 U.S.C. §1152; Title 18 U.S.C.§2 Take and Carry away with the intent to steal personal property of another within Indian Country
Title 18 U.S.C.§661, 2, and 1152 - LARCENY W/IN SPECIAL MARITIME JURISDICTION(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced six (6) months to Bureau of Prisons; one (1) year supervised release with conditions; no fine imposed; $25 special assessment due instanter
